titleStmt.title: Propositions extracted from the reasons for the foundation and promotion of a Philadelphian Society which were read at the first meeting of the same in Westmorland-House, London / offered to the consideration of all Christians; and now publish'd for the preventing or rectifying of mistakes.

Propositions extracted from the reasons for the foundation and promotion of a Philadelphian Society which were read at the first meeting of the same in Westmorland-House, London / offered to the consideration of all Christians; and now publish'd for the preventing or rectifying of mistakes.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for and sold by the booksellers of London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
